descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

[media]
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

[media]

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

[media]
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

[media]

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

[media]


Stay: Forever Home by the creators of **Bogo** and **First Steps**

# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499623592_1242411587354095_8518052294169653959_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=e42srezfm14Q7kNvwGEhd3d&_nc_oc=AdkQVaTu48J8XWKY2dT_VkyDurahB_PMgw0Q1N7PZSFCYg9-8xuECHc6qKwd3VrD_xI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=CSUYoa1ww_hYOM4jnmKEWQ&oh=00_AfoQoP1cyFoxII5pNOknR6CbE66ydwXtMHrj_nEAO5MwbA&oe=6968E310)
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491824697_1278851210611188_4094365675689352297_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=yjySVy06pUEQ7kNvwEXxbd0&_nc_oc=AdnVhhBcl-AabOTjghILOqkpnPBd52egeWOXwwA6QQpBgcywoAf6E2c_pZ9s-lna9Wg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=CSUYoa1ww_hYOM4jnmKEWQ&oh=00_Afr-mfha3VtiJeGfdWStkCTSIOALr4cE7r0xfyKpeBa2Hg&oe=6968CC96)

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292426_1471237290743467_5955331649547554072_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fQHz8Z0PpiAQ7kNvwHSOV9O&_nc_oc=AdnFShTWh9Y9JYN_VSHC3dJWdWc4itH2A0fczISi31S2-oRJDh5iHYI-lUkONqb1yWc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=CSUYoa1ww_hYOM4jnmKEWQ&oh=00_Afr2F3aB6kUUF3XjkOSHk-HEArPbx0mfp_IV9BSVx4rxJg&oe=6968D785)
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499299164_23905805109048560_5254487432958572571_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=nprza6bchGQQ7kNvwHBAqCo&_nc_oc=AdkV7AtSxyAF5xg5uG02ovWLcQtnpPENV7bfwk1WUm44nzXGlhQBduLgusflyn9icVM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=CSUYoa1ww_hYOM4jnmKEWQ&oh=00_AfoYViQNoQNcNTi-dMLihjOMCDCi-5qiGF1tYaZeAlBn2A&oe=69690267)

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819854_2661665637369878_2167100156395054220_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=5lHKeMjWPfUQ7kNvwFJjagE&_nc_oc=AdkcEtRD8XFuRKvBhgtYZ0EfkovsSv78XYBTnUf_UUhrWsogOFE9wf8KKvjUaGhxFr4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=CSUYoa1ww_hYOM4jnmKEWQ&oh=00_AfqWimMc-wC89z2tfVKMzJrfBHQyxyiSNJzxhaJPuCeY9w&oe=69690169)


Stay: Forever Home by the creators of **Bogo** and **First Steps**
